description: Not sure what to discuss in your next meeting? Let our question suggestion bot help you out! Tell us the type of meeting you're having, what topic you'd like to discuss and we'll provide a suggested questions to kickoff your conversation. 😀

title: myYogaTeacher
blurb: Helping you sleep better, reduce stress & get back in shape!
description: myYogaTeacher is an online yoga platform connecting Americans with expert Indian yoga teachers through LIVE 2-way video. So that you get access to some of the best and most experienced yoga teachers in the world from the comfort of your home.

title: TinyMonth
blurb: The simple, remixable calendar for tiny scheduling
description: TinyMonth is a Labs project from Postlight that lets users quickly sketch out some dates, evaluate those ranges ranges and share them with others.

title: Fantasy Invest
blurb: Daily fantasy sport meets the stock market
description: Fantasy Invest is a mashup between fantasy sports and the stock market. Test your market insights risk-free in one day! You can create fantasy portfolios, play daily games & rise on the leaderboard.

title: MentionIt
blurb: Beautiful quote snippets for social media
description: Boost engagement by sharing easy to read text images on social media. No complex image editing. Select text on any website, click on our extension and share in one click!

title: Roadtrippers Extraordinary Places
blurb: Amazing places worth a detour from the roadtrip experts
description: Extraordinary Places are the places that stay with you long after visiting. They are the places that fill you with wonder. They are epic natural wonders, weird roadside attractions, and deeply meaningful monuments.

title: UPI Stack for Businesses💸 by Cashfree
blurb: Collect & disburse UPI payments. 1 stack, 15+integrations.
description: Single UPI stack for all business collection & disbursal payment needs. UPI payment gateway, UPI QR codes, UPI payment links, API for bulk UPI disbursal, verification & more! Get access to all SDKs & APIs in a single stack & do 15+ integrations in no time.

title: Envoy Rooms
blurb: Room booking made easier for you and your team
description: Envoy is moving beyond the front desk to challenge the status quo in every area of the workplace. Today's the launch of Envoy Rooms -- built to make booking a conference room easier for everyone in your office.

title: DopeKicks
blurb: The 1st waterproof cannabis shoes
description: DopeKicks is a casual all-around shoe. There are a few reasons why we stand out. Here are our main features... ✅ Made with Hemp fibers ✅ Recycled rubber outsoles (100g per shoe) ✅ Premium cork Insoles ✅ 100% Waterproof ✅ 100% vegan ✅ Cool design

title: Horo
blurb: Start timers with fast and easy natural language
description: Horo is a free timer app for your Mac menu bar. Intuitive natural language input makes it fast and easy to start timers.

title: Walling for Windows
blurb: Visual walls for your ideas and projects. Now on Windows.
description: Working on a project, researching a topic or writing an article? Walling makes it easy to plot out your ideas, refine them and visually organize them. Walling is available for Windows, macOS and on the web.

title: Lunch Auction
blurb: Raise money for charity by selling an hour of your time
description: A place to raise money for charity or for yourself by selling an hour of time (as lunch, coffee, consultation or mentorship session). You can also buy someone's else time. For example, you can buy an hour with an investor in California while traveling there.

title: News Monitoring
blurb: Get more press by monitoring articles with filters & alerts
description: Our News Monitoring database is a database of thousands of news articles updated everyday, complete with journalist contact info to help you get more press. Start conversations & build relationships with journalists––without spamming them!

title: Orbitkey Nest
blurb: The portable desk organiser with built in wireless charger.
description: Nest is a home for all your everyday essentials – think cables, portable charger, mouse, and earphones. Movable dividers allow you to customise compartments to suit your items. The leather lid has an in-built wireless charger to keep your devices charged.

title: Routepath
blurb: Simple HTTPS, routing, and custom domains for your sites
description: Routepath is a hosted reverse proxy. It gives you a simple and easy way to: * Rewrite HTTP paths for a domain to various hosting services and CDNs * Add custom domains to services that don't provide it * Set up automatic HTTPS for your sites

title: Datapad
blurb: Search & calculate with your data
description: Many of us forget our numbers at the time of need. Datapad lets you easily search & make calculations with your numbers. If you deal with numbers on a daily basis, give it a go.

title: Duple
blurb: Your own private cloud at home in one click
description: Duple is an app that gives you your own private Dropbox at home in one click. Store, Sync, Backup, Share and Access your files from anywhere. It’s plug and play. Just download the app on your devices, plug any USB key to your internet router, and that's it!

title: RE:SHARE by StoryChief
blurb: Trigger your co-workers and fans to reshare your content
description: Let your ambassadors get your latest stories in their pocket. They can repost it to their personal networks with one click.

title: Savology
blurb: Free financial planning in 5 minutes. Plan smart. Save smart
description: Savology is helping American households improve their financial well-being by providing free financial planning in 5 minutes. Savology users get a free financial plan, report card, personalized action items, and financial planning modules to help them improve.

title: Interactive Customer Service Report 2020
blurb: Customer service metrics and insights in the form of web app
description: The Customer Service Report by LiveChat presents key metrics and insights from over 23k companies across 30 industries – all in an interactive and engaging web app. You can choose from ready made dashboards or create the exact dashboard adjusted to your needs.

title: Slack Standup for Busy Teams
blurb: Autocomplete standup updates
description: - Your activity from Jira & GitHub are added automatically. - Issue mentions are auto converted to links and expanded. - Works in shared channels (add consultants, vendor, partners from outside your org). Built for Agile teams. Free forever up to 10 users.

title: Think Up
blurb: Daily affirmations and motivation
description: ThinkUp is a wellness app that helps you build a positive mindset through affirmations and self-talk. Positive mindset is key to achieve goals, overcome challenges. ThinkUp makes positive affirmations easy, effective, and life changing!

title: Clatters
blurb: iOS app to monitor your brand on Social Media
description: Clatters is a simple, beautiful, and convenient iOS app to easily monitor in one place your brand name, product name or any other keyword on your favorite social networks - Twitter, Reddit, HackerNews and even comments from the iOS App Store.

title: Yoganotch
blurb: Personal yoga assistant powered by AI and motion sensors
description: Live audio feedback for yoga, powered by AI and motion sensors. Practice with Yoganotch app and get advice on your alignment based on 3D posture analysis. Yoganotch works with any clothes and is camera-free - practice anywhere, inside or outside, night or day.

title: Bet On Weather
blurb: Bet against your local meteorologist. Make money.
description: By bridging two consistently topical items (weather + gambling), we've created a new platform that will enable others to voice the expertise and opinions on the $7b industry that weather is. We're changing the way you look at the weather.

title: Neon Moiré
blurb: Discover design conferences around the world
description: Curated list of the most interested design conference and events on or digitized world. You can filter announced events by continent, country, month and type for now. View all events on a map or as calendar from today onwards, and save your favorite events.

title: Color Safe
blurb: Find accessible color palettes based on WCAG guidelines
description: I find this neat tool that allows me to easily explore and find the accessible color palette for the text and its background. I hope you can enjoy it too. Kudos to the makers, Donielle and Adrian!

title: Text For Humanity
blurb: Send a text you would love to get, to a stranger.
description: So pure, send a kind text out into the world and receive a kind text back.

title: Returns Center
blurb: Free returns management tool for eCommerce
description: AfterShip Returns Center is a must-have returns management portal that guarantees a happy post-purchase experience. 💞Build brand loyalty with self-service returns portal 🥰Improve customer satisfaction with prepaid labels 🤖Simplify process with automation rules

title: FitHero
blurb: Track your workouts without distractions 💪.
description: FitHero can be your notepad in the gym. Track your workouts and progress in a simple way. -- - ~300 exercises - Calendar, history an personal records - Copy & share workouts - Statistics - Backup & restore - No ads and no signup - Powered by React Native ⚛️

title: PDFBlade
blurb: The developer-friendly HTML to PDF API
description: PDFBlade is a feature-rich and powerful HTML to PDF API that's perfect for novice and expert developers alike. 💻 Includes a gorgeous, responsive dashboard. 📦 Store converted PDFs in Amazon S3 for 48 hours. 💰 Pay only for what you use.

title: Sleuth for Sketch
blurb: Measure the impact of your Sketch library components.
description: Sleuth is an open-source tool that enables your team to see how and where your design components are being used.

title: Daily Prompt
blurb: Become a better writer
description: Daily Prompt is a growing community of creative writers getting better at what they love. Tap into your imagination with daily writing prompts designed to encourage writing prose. Every day provides a new inspirational writing prompt that all users share.

title: Breezy
blurb: Quickly find the best insurance plans for your pets.
description: Hi We're Breezy, we want to help you quickly find the best and most affordable insurance for your pets!

title: Killed for Food
blurb: See how many animals are killed for food per second
description: Killed for Food shows you the number of animals killed per second by humans for food. Wait till you see the chickens.

title: PowerX
blurb: Save $400 per year on your water heating bill
description: PowerX makes water heating much more efficient. It is the Nest for water heating. It learns the water temperature you like and heats just as much water as is needed. PowerX saves an avg of $400/year and the CO2 emissions of what 10 fully grown trees can do!

title: Acuity Scheduling
blurb: Modern appointment scheduling software
description: Acuity Scheduling is your online assistant, working 24/7 to fill your schedule. Clients can quickly view your real-time availability and self-book their own appointments—and even pay online, reschedule with a click, and eliminate 100% of the drudgery.

title: De-Mainstream YouTube™
blurb: A browser extension to remove Mainstream Media from YouTube
description: The Demainstream extension provides a list of mainstream media channels that you can select to block from YouTube searches. Once selected, all YouTube searches will hide the selected YouTube channels automatically from the results. https://demainstream.com

title: Filter - Figma Plugin
blurb: A powerful Filter breaks into your Figma workflow!
description: More than 30 custom filters are available! The plugin allows you to edit the applied filters.

title: LINER for MS Edge
blurb: All-in-one web highlighter for the new MS Edge
description: #1 Web & PDF Highlighter for moible and PC. LINER is a web highlighter that helps you highlight texts on the internet. We help you filter out noisy content, so you can focus on key references. Sometimes you only need one sentence from a 100-page document.

title: Salesla
blurb: The tool for growing your Amazon business
description: Salesla helps you collect & manage reviews and feedback for sellers selling on Amazon.

title: Push Hero
blurb: Test iOS push notifications
description: Push Hero is a native macOS application written in pure Swift that allows us to easily test push notifications.

title: Happyfeed 3.0
blurb: Simple journaling app with a social twist 🌀
description: A simple journaling app for iOS and Android to help you cultivate little moments of joy and gratitude. Record 3 gratitudes or positive moments each day to boost your happiness by focusing more on the bright side of things.

title: Stash
blurb: Your privacy-focused personal finance manager
description: Stash is a privacy-focused personal finance manager my team & I built to help users track & manage their finances privately. With Stash, you can: ✏️ Add your expenses 🔎 Break down & analyse your spending 🔓 Add budgets for each category

title: Notivize
blurb: no-code notification solution for product teams
description: Notivize allows non-technical teams to build and iterate the entire app notification lifecycle without being dependent on engineers for each iteration. Unlike marketing tools, Notivize is for product teams who are communicating about specific user activities.

title: Moviebase
blurb: Discover, find and track your favorite movies & TV shows.
description: Moviebase for Android gives you the best overview of movies & TV shows from the largest community network The Movie Database (TMDb). You can discover movies and TV series, or browse through many categories to get the right information.

title: GitSpo
blurb: Measure & engage your open-source community
description: GitSpo aggregates GitHub, NPM and PyPI data, and alerts open-source developers when their projects are mentioned on websites like Twitter, Reddit and Hacker News.

title: Awesome Social Network
blurb: Kindness content with creation tools, templates & rewards
description: Awesome- is a free alternative social network, a tool to create a ripple effect of Kindness through original content creation tools, templates and rewards.

title: LivePitch
blurb: Shopping brought to you live.
description: LivePitch allows buyers to engage in direct live conversations with sellers. Interact and engage with sellers and influencers as you discover the products that best suit your needs. See products so that you can get a good sense of how it looks in real life!

title: DailyBot for Students
blurb: Helping students achieve goals with reminders and automation
description: DailyBot + GitHub Education are launching this product to allow Students all around the world make the first steps into highly effective collaboration by following best practices that are already used by thousands of professionals worldwide.

title: Myscore.today
blurb: Check your influencers score
description: With the help of Myscore, you can measure your influence on Facebook. We developed a mathematical model, which determines the level of your influence in social networks on the scale from 1 to 100.

title: Selftalker
blurb: Sometimes you need to talk with yourself
description: We communicate with people a lot, but no one can understand us better than we do. Selftalker will help you chat with yourself. This way, you can better understand yourself and your problems.

title: Ovuli
blurb: Ovulation calculator in your terminal
description: Ovuli is a simple ovulation cycle calculator that you can access from your terminal. As menstrual periods differ from woman to woman and even month to month, this tool can help you keep track of your ovulation cycle and find your most fertile days.

title: CuraCine
blurb: The best curated cinema.
description: CuraCine is a web app that shows a curated and unbiased selection of the movies that stand out, with an original categorization, more ‘down-to-earth’ and true to the soul of each film, based on their mastery, reaction they provoke and theme they fall into.

title: OneHandWizard
blurb: True one hand use on the iPhone
description: As phone screens get bigger, I have struggled with full one hand use that reachability and other features have not solved. With my friend Janosch, we built OneHandWizard which allows full one hand use with dynamic scaling of the screen.

title: Magicdocs
blurb: Turn proposals into beautiful websites
description: Turn your proposals into beautiful websites. Surprise your clients with custom landing pages tailored for each project, tell your story and close more deals. - It's magical.

title: Noisli 3.0
blurb: Your digital place for focus
description: Noisli is your digital place for focus. We provide background sounds that help to mask annoying noises in order to help you work and relax. Get inspired by our playlists or mix and match different sounds and create your perfect sound environment.

title: TalentLyft
blurb: One tool. Everything you need to hire top talent.
description: TalentLyft is the only recruiting software on the market which integrates Applicant Tracking System (ATS), Recruitment Marketing Platform, Sourcing and Talent CRM solution, as well as Advanced Analytics under one powerful platform.

title: Tony.surf
blurb: A new way to share all your links. ✌️
description: Tony.surf a new way to share all your links. You can add your links in block format with background image and text description. See an example https://tony.surf/tony

title: Fidlio
blurb: Collect feedback and know what to build next
description: Let your users suggest new features, and let other users vote and make comments on them. They'll get notified if you build that feature. Plan what to build next with our gold&coal chart. There's nothing worse than building the features that nobody wants!
